mapper.insert: merge into like_list using dual on (client_no=#{clientNo} and content_no=#{contentNo}) when not matched then insert (client_no, content_no) values (#{clientNo}, #{contentNo})
mapper.delete: delete like_list where client_no=#{clientNo} and content_no=#{contentNo}
mapper.select: select * from like_list where client_no=#{clientNo} and content_no=#{contentNo}
